meta.hint:
Past tense verbs tell about something that has already happened. To make a past tense verb, you usually just add -ed.
walk → walked Example - We walked to the shops yesterday.
If the verb already ends with an -e, you just add -d.
bake → baked Example - Jane baked a cake last week.
meta.question: Complete the sentence in the past tense.

content.description: Tom _____ his closet to find his coat.
I _____ my mother to make sandwiches for me.
